# Savings
## Summary Statistics

```{r}
# reading in the data
household <- readxl::read_excel('BIHS_household_2011_15.xlsx')
child <- readxl::read_excel('BIHS_child_health_2011_15.xlsx')
```

```{r}
# tables
pander::pander(table(household$hhhead_gender, household$house_owned))
pander::pander(table(household$hhhead_gender, household$asset_television))
pander::pander(table(household$hhhead_gender, household$asset_telephone))
pander::pander(table(household$hhhead_gender, household$asset_tractor))
```

```{r}
# exploratory plots
gf_bar(~hhhead_gender, data = subset(household, !is.na(asset_telephone)), xlab = "Gender", ylab = "Count", fill = ~ asset_telephone, factor(survey_year))
```
